## SavedObjectsUpdateOptions.retryOnConflict property

The Elasticsearch `retry_on_conflict` setting for this operation. Defaults to `0` when `version` is provided, `3` otherwise.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
retryOnConflict?: number;
```
